Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • desafiointelie.Connector
  • public class Connector
extends java.lang.Object
    Connects this APP to TCP server.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public boolean connect​(char quittingChar)
        Connect to TCP server.
        Parameters:
        quittingChar - Char to quit application. If '\0' application will close only with CTRL+C or if connection is finished
        Returns:
        true if connection Success or false otherwise
        See Also:
        getError(), getErrorMessage()

      • getError

        public java.lang.String getError()
        Gets last error of the connection.
        Returns:
        Error text containing error.

      • getErrorMessage

        public java.lang.String getErrorMessage()
        Gets last error message of the connection
        Returns:
        Error message

      • readStream

        public java.lang.String readStream()
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a stream from connected server

        Returns:
        String containing received data if success. null|IOException if error occurs.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        public boolean close()
        Close connection to server.
        Returns:
        true if connection is close successfully otherwise returns false
